sentences.en: "It's only a sprain," Paula said brusquely.
sentences.cn: “只是扭伤了筋，”葆拉简短生硬地说。

sentences.en: He and Paula made an unlikely pair.
sentences.cn: 他和葆拉不太可能成为一对儿。

sentences.en: He waited until all the luggage was cleared, but Paula's never appeared.
sentences.cn: 他一直等到所有的行李都拿走了，但始终没看见葆拉的。

sentences.en: I knew how unbalanced Paula had been since my uncle Peter died.
sentences.cn: 我知道葆拉自从我叔叔彼得去世后情绪一直很不稳定。

sentences.en: I thought she might be interested in Paula's proposal.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她对葆拉的提议可能会感兴趣。

sentences.en: I threw a mute look of appeal at Paula.
sentences.cn: 我默默地向葆拉投去恳求的目光。

sentences.en: If the speeches are not going well, ask Paula to speak; she can always raise a laugh.
sentences.cn: 如果发言气氛不太好的话, 就让宝拉说两句; 她总是能逗人发笑.

sentences.en: In November 1987 Paula escaped with a caution. In October 1988 she was fined.
sentences.cn: 1987年11月,葆拉运气好只是受到了口头警告;1988年10月,她被处以罚款.
宝拉皱了皱眉头, 突然警惕起来.

sentences.en: Paula got into the car and drove off.
sentences.cn: 葆拉钻进汽车后驾车而去。

sentences.en: Paula had never seen an epileptic seizure.
sentences.cn: 葆拉从没见过有人癫痫发作。

sentences.en: Paula had put out her luggage for the coach.
sentences.cn: 葆拉拿好行李准备上长途汽车。

sentences.en: Paula is the only artist to achieve four number ones from a debut album.
sentences.cn: 葆拉是唯一的首张唱片4次荣登排行榜榜首的艺人。

sentences.en: Peter asks Paula to go to dinner.
sentences.cn: 彼得请保拉去共进晚餐。

sentences.en: Peter says, 'We could order some pizza and then watch the golf on TV!' Paula becomes silent.
sentences.cn: 彼得说：“我们叫比萨饼外卖，然后一边吃一边开电视看高尔夫球！” 保拉不说话了。

sentences.en: Self - confident , ambitious and positive, Paula is a tough cookie who is bound to do well.
sentences.cn: 葆拉自信、乐观 、 有抱负,且相当有主见,她肯定会有所成就.

sentences.en: The choice was up to Paula.
